amendment.description: To reauthorize the Runaway and Homeless Youth Act, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1127, under the order of 4/21/2015, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 53. Record Vote Number: 158.

action.text: Amendment SA 1127 proposed by Senator Cornyn.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1127, under the order of 4/21/2015, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 53. Record Vote Number: 158.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1127, under the order of 4/21/2015, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 53. Record Vote Number: 158.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1127 proposed by Senator Cornyn.
